column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////D' best thin crust pizza in the midwest! Drove from the gateway arch to have a good pizza
column2: and it's worth the 300 miles to try this deliciousness of a round dough. When we arrived the line was also 300 meters long that we just opted to go
column3: and after the first bite I got a taste of mecca decca pizzeria fantasia. And let me correct my first statement
column4: Drove from the gateway arch to have an excellent thin crust pizza.
